name: Ragnarok Online 2: Legend of the Second
name_original: Ragnarok Online 2: Legend of the Second
description:
Ragnarok Online 2: Legend of the Second is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by GRAVITY. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Gravity. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Ragnarok Online 2: Legend of the Second on PC.
Jun Jin Soo produced the game. Yoko Kanno scored the game.
